mapper.select:
SELECT
,news.news_name as newsName ,news.news_types as newsTypes ,news.news_photo as newsPhoto ,news.tuijian_types as tuijianTypes ,news.news_content as newsContent ,yonghu.yonghu_name as yonghuName ,yonghu.yonghu_photo as yonghuPhoto ,yonghu.yonghu_phone as yonghuPhone ,yonghu.yonghu_id_number as yonghuIdNumber ,yonghu.yonghu_email as yonghuEmail ,yonghu.yonghu_delete as yonghuDelete
FROM news_liuyan a left JOIN news news ON a.news_id = news.id left JOIN yonghu yonghu ON a.yonghu_id = yonghu.id
and a.id in
#{item}
and ( a.news_id = #{params.newsId} )
and ( a.yonghu_id = #{params.yonghuId} )
and a.news_liuyan_text like CONCAT('%',#{params.newsLiuyanText},'%')
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.insert_time) >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeStart})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.insert_time) <= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeEnd})
and a.reply_text like CONCAT('%',#{params.replyText},'%')
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.update_time) >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.updateTimeStart})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.update_time) <= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.updateTimeEnd})
and a.news_id IS NOT NULL
and news.news_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.newsName},'%')
and news.news_types = #{params.newsTypes}
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(news.insert_time) >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeStart})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(news.insert_time) <= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeEnd})
and news.tuijian_types = #{params.tuijianTypes}
and news.news_content like CONCAT('%',#{params.newsContent},'%')
and a.yonghu_id IS NOT NULL
and yonghu.yonghu_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuName},'%')
and yonghu.yonghu_phone like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuPhone},'%')
and yonghu.yonghu_id_number like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuIdNumber},'%')
and yonghu.yonghu_email like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuEmail},'%')
and yonghu.yonghu_delete >= #{params.yonghuDeleteStart}
and yonghu.yonghu_delete <= #{params.yonghuDeleteEnd}
and yonghu.yonghu_delete = #{params.yonghuDelete}
order by a.${params.sort} ${params.order}
